Most of the variables are inside
, specific component variables are inside the component's less files.
vars you have a boolean or a list of breakpoints. With a boolean you activate/deactivate
, with a breakpoint you also activate classes generation
is the accent color, usually used by
is for text on dark backgrounds.
There are also shadow and gradient variables.
vars that you can use with a
you need to set the class breakpoint generation with
All z-index used in the library, you can change the values but it's better to keep the sequential z-index order the same.
The breakpoints are used on media queries and many components, be sure to list all breakpoints inside the variable
You can edit media queries and breakpoints.
